Executive Office Of Energy And Environmental Affairs

law.catch_line: Soil Containing Dangerous Levels Of Lead; Cover And Disposal; Regulations
law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 27, 2011. For text effective March 27, 2011, see below.] The department of environmental protection shall in consultation with the director of the childhood lead poisoning prevention program and the director of labor and workforce development, promulgate regulations specifying adequate methods of cover and disposal of soil containing dangerous levels of lead. Such regulations shall be promulgated within one hundred and eighty days after the director of the childhood lead poisoning prevention program has promulgated regulations defining dangerous levels of lead in soil. Chapter 21A: Soil containing dangerous levels of lead; cover and disposal; regulations [ Text of section as amended by 2011, 3, Sec. 14 effective March 27, 2011. For text effective until March 27, 2011, see above.] The department of environmental protection shall in consultation with the director of the childhood lead poisoning prevention program and the director of labor standards, promulgate regulations specifying adequate methods of cover and disposal of soil containing dangerous levels of lead. Such regulations shall be promulgated within one hundred and eighty days after the director of the childhood lead poisoning prevention program has promulgated regulations defining dangerous levels of lead in soil.
